BEGIN
DECLARE @result int
DELETE Orders WHERE OrderId=@OrderId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GetProducts]
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @DATE DATE=GETDATE()
BEGIN INSERT INTO AddToCart(CustomerId,ProductId,Price,Quantity,[DATE]) Values(@CustomerId,@ProductId,@Price,@Quantity,@DATE) END
--exec InsertCart '101','P0001','2222.',2
--select * from Customers --select * from Product --select * from AddToCart

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @DATE DATE=GETDATE() DECLARE @DATETIME2 DATE=GETDATE()+2 BEGIN
INSERT INTO Orders (ProductId,CustomerId,OrderDate,OrderDeliveryDate,Status) Values(@ProductId, @CustomerId,@DATE,@DATETIME2,@Status)
END
--exec SP_InsertOrder 'P0001','100','place order'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
INSERT INTO Product(ProductName,CategoryId,Descriptions,Price,Quantity,Images) Values(@ProductName, @CategoryId,@Descriptions,@Price,@Quantity,@Images)
SELECT CAST(SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS INT)
END
--Exec SP_InsertProduct 'Mobile','1','Happy Life','20000.',1,'image'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * From Product WHERE ProductId Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR ProductName Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR CategoryId Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Descriptions Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Price Like '%'+@keyword+'%' OR Quantity Like '%'+@keyword+'%'
END
--exec SP_SearchProductByKeyword 'P0'
--select * from Product

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE AddToCart SET CustomerId=@CustomerId, ProductId=@ProductId, Price=@Price, Quantity=@Quantity
WHERE Id=@Id
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateCartById '100'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
DECLARE @DATE DATE=GETDATE() DECLARE @DATETIME2 DATE=GETDATE()+2 BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE Orders SET ProductId = @ProductId, CustomerId = @CustomerId, Status = @Status
WHERE CustomerId=@CustomerId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateProductById '100'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @result int
UPDATE Product SET ProductName=@ProductName, CategoryId=@CategoryId, Descriptions=@Descriptions, Price=@Price, Quantity=@Quantity, Images=@Images WHERE ProductId=@ProductId
IF @@ERROR=0 SET @result=1 ELSE SET @result=0
SELECT @result
END
--exec SP_UpdateProductById '1'

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE CustomerEmail = @CustomerEmail AND CustomerPassword =@CustomerPassword END
